General.Name: Guobang Pharma Ltd
General.Description: Guobang Pharma Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of products in the pharmaceutical and veterinary fields. The company provides active pharmaceutical ingredients (API), key pharmaceutical intermediates, and preparations; and active pharmaceutical ingredients, additives, and preparations for animal health products. Its products include quinolones, marcolides, cephalosporins, characteristic APIs, preparations and accessories, mobile protection APIs, kinetophoretic preparations, and feed additives. The company sells its products approximately in 110 countries and regions worldwide. Guobang Pharma Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Xinchang, China.
